odm.account.security.two-step.setup-wiza: Scan the QR Code or enter the following key into your two factor authenticator app such as Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator. Spaces and casing do not matter
Once you have scanned the QR code or entered the key above, your two factor authentication app will provide you with a unique code. Enter that code in the confirmation box below
Next time you log in you will be prompted to use two factor authentication
Save below one time access codes in case you do not have access to your phone
Something went wrong, plesae try again.
odm.account.security.two-step.recovery-c: You can use these one time codes to access your account
Write these down and keep them safe
